Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it returns the entire array when the length of the array is greater than or equal to 2, instead of returning only the first two elements. Generated Test cases 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 should pass the buggy code as they have less than or equal to 2 elements. Test cases 6, 7, 8 should fail the buggy code as they have more than 2 elements.
